SVGAnimatedLength.summary: The SVGAnimatedLength interface represents attributes of type <length> which can be animated.

SVGAnimatedLengthBaseVal.summary: The baseVal property of the interface contains the initial value of an SVG enumeration.
SVGAnimatedLengthBaseVal.value: An containing the initial value of the length.

SVGAnimatedLengthAnimVal.summary: The animVal property of the interface contains the current value of an SVG enumeration. If there is no animation, it is the same value as the .
SVGAnimatedLengthAnimVal.value: An containing the current value of the enumeration.
